content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start, I would like to explore if there is any room for price reduction considering the current market situation and my status as a student. Could we possibly look into a lower end of the price range for this highly convenient location?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not in the business of giving discounts based on one's status or the current market situation. I'm trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
